posts.title: Client Ipsum
posts.description: It looks a bit empty, try to make everything bigger I think we need to start from scratch we need more images of groups of people having non-specific types of fun, yet start on it today and we will talk about what i want next time for can you make the blue bluer?. Theres all this spanish text on my site i cant pay you , I have an awesome idea for a startup, i need you to build it for me, that's great, but can you make it work for ie 2 please yet there is too much white space for i know you've made thirty iterations but can we go back to the first one that was the best version so i cant pay you . Is there a way we can make the page feel more introductory without being cheesy try making it a bit less blah could you move it a tad to the left. That sandwich needs to be more playful concept is bang on, but can we look at a better execution. I have an awesome idea for a startup, i need you to build it for me. Make it pop what is a hamburger menu. I really like the colour but can you change it I know somebody who can do this for a reasonable cost, but can you use a high definition screenshot jazz it up a little could you do an actual logo instead of a font something summery; colourful. There are more projects lined up charge extra the next time this was not according to brief, for low resolution? It looks ok on my screen, yet just do what you think. I trust you. Concept is bang on, but can we look at a better execution. Can you make it more infographic-y. Can you make it stand out more? the flier should feel like a warm handshake i know you've made thirty iterations but can we go back to the first one that was the best version so remember, everything is the same or better is this the best we can do is there a way we can make the page feel more introductory without being cheesy I got your invoice...it seems really high, why did you charge so much. Can you punch up the fun level on these icons can we have another option can you make pink a little more pinkish that's great, but can you make it work for ie 2 please can you make it look more designed . Make it pop that sandwich needs to be more playful, yet can you lower the price for the website? make it high quality and please use html can you make the font a bit bigger and change it to times new roman? jazz it up a little bit make the picture of the cupcake look delicious make the purple more well, purple-er it looks so empty add some more hearts can you add a bit of pastel pink and baby blue because the purple alone looks too fancy okay can you put a cute quote on the right side of the site? oh no it looks messed up! i think we need to start from scratch. We are your relatives that sandwich needs to be more playful, so are you busy this weekend? I have a new project with a tight deadline. Can you pimp this powerpoint, need more geometry patterns can you rework to make the pizza look more delicious, for there is too much white space make it sexy i know you've made thirty iterations but can we go back to the first one that was the best version I need a website. How much will it cost, and what is a hamburger menu. Can you make it stand out more?. We are your relatives it looks a bit empty, try to make everything bigger remember, everything is the same or better I know somebody who can do this for a reasonable cost, yet something summery; colourful, can you make the logo bigger yes bigger bigger still the logo is too big.

posts.title: Trump Ipsum
posts.description:
An ‘extremely credible source’ has called my office and told me that Barack Obama’s placeholder text is a fraud. You know, it really doesn’t matter what you write as long as you’ve got a young, and beautiful, piece of text.

If Trump Ipsum weren’t my own words, perhaps I’d be dating it. If Trump Ipsum weren’t my own words, perhaps I’d be dating it.

You’re disgusting. I was going to say something extremely rough to Lorem Ipsum, to its family, and I said to myself, "I can't do it. I just can't do it. It's inappropriate. It's not nice."

This placeholder text is gonna be HUGE. He’s not a word hero. He’s a word hero because he was captured. I like text that wasn’t captured. Look at that text! Would anyone use that? Can you imagine that, the text of your next webpage?! An ‘extremely credible source’ has called my office and told me that Barack Obama’s placeholder text is a fraud.

You could see there was text coming out of her eyes, text coming out of her wherever. Lorem Ipsum is the single greatest threat. We are not - we are not keeping up with other websites. My placeholder text, I think, is going to end up being very good with women.
